### Welcome to HTML Slide This is a simple application built on top of backbone and jquery for making presentation slides on HTML.If you don't have MS PowerPoint , you can use this. Download all the files from the source. Open the index.html in browser. You will see presentation with some sample slide in html page. ### Prerequisites * jQuery * backbone * underscore * handlebars Please have little knowledge on these frameworks for easy understanding. ### HTMLSlide API's and Template #### API `createSlide` : This will create & returns backbone view for the slide. Parameters (as JSON object): * **slideClass** - css classname for slide main div, * **header** - title appears on top of the slide, * **sectionClass** - css classname for the content div of the slide, * **slideTemplate** - HTML template for the slide , * **content** - content of the slide ( HTML, text, image) returns : Backbone view of a Slide `createSlidePoints` Parameters: * **pointsArr** - Array of strings ( points ), * **SlideView** - Object returned with this 'createSlide', returns : undefined ##### Template
{{header}}
Add this template inside a script tag and use it while creating slide. ### How to create Slide Load the htmlslide.js as part of the prerequisites in your page. It will return you the HTMLSlide class available in the window context. Create a instance of it by passing a html element present in your dom. Use the //Slide 1 var htmlSlide = new HTMLSlide($('.slides')); var slide1 = htmlSlide.createSlide({ slideClass : "current", header : "", sectionClass : "middle", slideTemplate : slideTemplate, content : '
